Body: Possible Duplicate:  Is it possible to install Android on a PC?  Can we install Android OS on to a desktop? If yes can some one share the same thing. I have tried steps from How-To-Geek and from Android-x86 - Porting Android to x86. Whenever I try to boot from the USB it says "error: unknown filesystem." and stays on grub rescue prompt.
Title: how to install android OS on desktop pc?

history.Text: Can we install Android OS on to a desktop? If yes can some one share the same thing. I have tried steps from [How-To-Geek][1] and from [Android-x86 - Porting Android to x86][2]. Whenever I try to boot from the USB it says "error: unknown filesystem." and stays on grub rescue prompt.  [1]: http://www.howtogeek.com/howto/22665/run-android-on-your-netbook-or-desktop/  [2]: http://www.android-x86.org/documents/installhowto
how to install android OS on desktop pc?

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [Is it possible to install Android on a PC?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/3521/is-it-possible-to-install-android-on-a-pc)  Can we install Android OS on to a desktop? If yes can some one share the same thing. I have tried steps from [How-To-Geek][1] and from [Android-x86 - Porting Android to x86][2]. Whenever I try to boot from the USB it says "error: unknown filesystem." and stays on grub rescue prompt.  [1]: http://www.howtogeek.com/howto/22665/run-android-on-your-netbook-or-desktop/  [2]: http://www.android-x86.org/documents/installhowto

Can we install Android OS on to a desktop? If yes can some one share the same thing. I have tried steps from [How-To-Geek][1] and from [Android-x86 - Porting Android to x86][2]. Whenever I try to boot from the USB it says "error: unknown filesystem." and stays on grub rescue prompt.My PC has : Intel Atom 270 processor with Intel 945GSE chip-set and RAM of 512MB DDR3;  [1]: http://www.howtogeek.com/howto/22665/run-android-on-your-netbook-or-desktop/  [2]: http://www.android-x86.org/documents/installhowto
